titles.title: To designate the Blue Ridge Parkway headquarters building located at 199 Hemphill Knob in Asheville, North Carolina, as the "Gary E. Everhardt Headquarters Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 5/19/2000--Introduced. Designates the Blue Ridge Parkway headquarters building located at 199 Hemphill Knob in Asheville, North Carolina, as the Gary E. Everhardt Headquarters Building.
